subject: ATTENTION:SIR,
body:
ATTENTION:SIR,
THIS TO INFORM YOU THAT WE HAVE RECEIVED INSTRUCTION WITH YOUR PAYMENT FILE FROM OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENCY TO TRANSFER YOUR INHERITANCE PAYMENT US$32,500,000.00 TO YOUR BANK ACCOUNT IN BY MONDAY AS SOON AS ALL CHARGES IS DEDUCTED.
PLEASE RE-CONFIRM YOUR  BANK INFORMATION TO AVOID ANY MISTAKE DURING THE TRANSFER BY MONDAY. WE ARE GOING TO TRANSFER YOUR INHERITANCE PAYMENT OF US$32,500,000.00 TO YOUR BANK ACCOUNT BY TOMORROW AND THE TRANSFER CONFIRMATION SLIPS WILL BE SENT TO YOU FOR YOUR EASY
CONFIRMATION.
AS A MATTER OF URGENCY YOU ARE ADVISED TO MAKE A PAYMENT OF US$52 BEEN  PAYMENT OF DEDUCTION FEE.
THE DEDUCTION FEE OF US$52 WILL ENABLE THIS  BANK TO OBTAIN AN AFFIDAVIT AND STAMP DUTIES FROM  HIGH COURT OF NIGERIA, WHICH WILL EMPOWER US TO DEDUCT ALL CHARGES AND PREPARE YOUR DEDUCTION CERTIFICATE THAT WILL SHOW THAT ALL CHARGES HAVE BEEN DEDUCTED AND YOU WILL NOT PAY ANY OTHER FEE.
YOU ARE ADVISED TO SEND THE DEDUCTION FEE OF US$52 TODAY THROUGH MONEY GRAM TRANSFER WITH THE NAME OF THE OFFICER IN CHARGE,  ELEANYA CHIJIOKE CHUKWU ,LAGOS NIGERIA,
AS SOON AS WE RECEIVE THIS PAYMENT FROM YOU TODAY, WE WILL DEDUCT ALL CHARGES AND YOUR BALANCE WILL BE REMITTED TO YOUR ACCOUNT BY TOMORROW MORNING AND THE TRANSFER DETAILS WILL BE FORWARDED TO YOU FOR YOUR EASY CONFIRMATION WITH YOUR BANK.
HERE IS THE MONEY GRAM TRANSFER INFORMATION BELOW:
RECEIVER NAME: ELEANYA CHIJIOKE CHUKWU .
ADDRESS: LAGOS NIGERIA
SENDERS NAME:
SENDERS ADDRESS:
AMOUNT: US$52
ACT ACCORDING TO THE INSTRUCTIONS, I AM WAITING FOR YOUR URGENT RESPONSE.
NOTE: MAKE SURE YOU CALL ME AS SOON AS YOU RECEIVE THIS E-MAIL+234-816-339-1717 TO DISCUSS WAY FORWARD.
REGARDS AND GOD BLESS YOU.
YOURS FAITHFULLY
MR.MARTINS EDWARD
FOREIGN OPERATION DEPARTMENT
KEYSTONE BANK GROUP
TEL:+234-816-339-1717

subject: Re:   ATTENTION:SIR,
body:
Hello Edward,

Thank you for your message. It's exciting to hear about the transfer! I'm a bit confused though, could you please clarify a few things for me?

Firstly, what is this payment for? I don't recall having any pending payments. Also, could you explain more about the deduction fee? Why do I need to pay it and how does it work?

Lastly, who is Eleanya Chijioke Chukwu? Is he also part of Keystone Bank Group?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
James

subject: FROM KEYSTONE BANK GROUP
body:
DEAR MR.JAMES,

THANKS FOR YOUR MAIL.THE PAYMENT OF THE REQUIRE $50 IS THE COST OUR BANK
ATTORNEY WILL USE TO GET FOR YOU AN AFFIDAVIT DEDUCTION CERTIFICATE FROM
THE HIGH COURT,IF THE BANK OBTAINED THE AFFIDAVIT DEDUCTION CERTIFICATE,IT
WILL EMPOWER THE BANK TO DEDUCT EVERY CHARGES THAT MIGHT EMERGE DURING THE
TRANSFER OF THE FUND TO YOU WITHOUT REQUESTING ANY MONEY FROM YOU AGAIN AS
THE BANK WILL DEDUCT EVERY CHARGES FROM YOUR FUND WHILE THE REST BALANCE
SHALL BE REMITTED INTO YOUR BANK ACCOUNT.

LASTLY,ELEANYA CHIJIOKE CHUKWU IS ALSO A STAFF OF KEYSTONE BANK GROUP.

IF WE CAN GET THE AFFIDAVIT DEDUCTION CERTIFICATE FROM THE COURT THROUGH
OUR BANK ATTORNEY,THE BANK SHALL COMMENCE IMMEDIATELY FOR THE TRANSFER OF
YOUR  $32.5MILLION TO YOU WITHOUT ANY FURTHER DELAY.

WE WAIT TO HEAR FROM YOU SOON.

REGARDS AND GOD BLESS YOU.

YOURS FAITHFULLY,

MR.MARTINS EDWARD
FOREIGN OPERATION DEPARTMENT
KEYSTONE BANK GROUP
TEL:+234-816-339-1717

subject: Re: FROM KEYSTONE BANK GROUP
body:
Hello Edward,

Thank you for your message. It's a pleasure to hear from you. I'm not quite sure I understand everything, though. Could you please explain what an Affidavit Deduction is? And how does it empower the bank to deduct charges?

Also, could you tell me more about Chijioke Chukwu and his role at Keystone Bank Group? 

I'm looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
James

subject: Re: FROM KEYSTONE BANK GROUP
body:
Hello Edward,

Thank you for your message. I'm a bit confused about the process you've described, could you please clarify it for me? What exactly is an affidavit deduction and how does it work? 

Also, could you explain why Chijioke Chukwu's role in Keystone Bank Group is relevant to this situation? 

I'm looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
James

subject: FROM KEYSTONE BANK GROUP
body:
DEAR  MR.JAMES,

WE RECEIVED YOUR MAIL AND THE CONTENT IS WELL NOTED.

THE AFFIDAVIT DEDUCTION CERTIFICATE IS A DOCUMENT THAT COURT GIVES TO HELP
SOLVE ANY PROBLEMS BETWEEN BANK AND IT'S CLIENT IN ANY MONETARY
TRANSACTIONS.IF A CLIENT WANT ANY TRANSFER CHARGES TO BE DEDUCTED FROM HIS
FUND THE CLIENT HAVE TO GET THE AFFIDAVIT DEDUCTION CERTIFICATE FROM THE
COURT.

THE AFFIDAVIT DEDUCTION CERTIFICATE IF OBTAINED BY THE BANK,IT GIVES THE
BANK AN AUTHORITY TO DEDUCT EVERY CHARGES FROM THE FUND WHICH THE BANK WANT
TO TRANSFER TO IT'S CLIENT WITHOUT DEMANDING ANY MORE MONEY FROM THE CLIENT
BUT ONLY TO DEDUCT ANY CHARGES  FROM THE CLIENT;S FUND.

AS FOR ELEANYA CHIJIOKE CHUKWU IS A STAFF AND IS ONE OF THE SENIOR BANK
MESSENGER.

WE DO NOT WANT ANY DELAYS OR ANY HINDRANCE AS SOON AS WE COMNCE THE
TRANSFER OF YOUR $32.5M AND THAT IS THE REASON WE NEED THE AFFIDAVIT
DEDUCTION CERTIFICATE TO HELP US MAKE THESE TRANSACTION VERY SUCCESSFUL.

IF WE CAN RECEIVE THE $50 FEE TODAY FOR THE AFFIDAVIT DEDUCTION
CERTIFICATE,THE BANK ATTORNEY WILL MOVE IMMEDIATELY TO THE HIGH COURT TO
GET THE DEDUCTION CERTIFICATE ON YOUR BEHALF,AFTER THAT IS DONE,THE BANK
WILL COMMENCE IMMEDIATELY FOR YOUR PAYMENTS, WITHOUT GETTING THE AFFIDAVIT
DEDUCTION CERTIFICATE,THE BANK WILL NOT LAY THEIR HANDS ON YOUR FILE FOR
YOUR PAYMENT.

BEST REGARDS.

MR.MARTINS EDWARD
FOREIGN OPERATION DEPARTMENT
KEYSTONE BANK GROUP
TEL:+234-816-339-1717
